alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:36PM CDT until August 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEWELL AND SOUTHERN NUCKOLLS COUNTIES... At 834 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nora, or 30 miles northwest of Belleville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 807 PM CDT ping pong ball size hail was reported in Lawrence. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Superior around 840 PM CDT. Hardy around 855 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
